title.value: Extension UK Core Subscription Notification Payload Size

description.value: An extension to replicate the changes within R5 to support the indication of how much of the resource content to deliver in a notification payload.

purpose.value: This extension is a Multicast Network Service (MNS) use case, require to indicate how much of the resource content to deliver in a notification payload (specifying decision to received either a hydrated or full resource).
